findings: Gemini 3 is Google's most intelligent AI model with enhanced reasoning, multimodal capabilities, and coding performance
Gemini 3 is available across Google products including Gemini app, AI Studio, and Vertex AI
Gemini 3 features advanced world modeling capabilities with sophisticated visual reasoning and robust function calling
Gemini app has surpassed 650 million monthly users and AI Overviews reach 2 billion monthly users
risks: Limited public information available about specific performance improvements
Deep Think mode not yet available
Platform-specific access restrictions may limit broad adoption
recommendations: Evaluate Gemini 3 through available platforms (AI Studio, Vertex AI, Gemini app)
Consider YouWare for rapid prototyping without API setup
Monitor for Deep Think mode availability for complex problem-solving
